Articles.Content:
Hi. I've only been playing for a few weeks, and as advertised, the learning curve is pretty steep.

I'm hoping to catch up quickly though.
Hi Starchaser. Good luck in your endeavours.

Welcome, Starchaser. I'm still climbing the 'learning wall' myself. There are tonnes of helpful people in the community here and a great deal of resources for the both the new player and the seasoned pro. If you have any specific questions, feel free to ask them in the Gameplay Questions section of the forum.

Happy landings!
Welcome aboard, cadet! It takes a while to learn, yeah, and always remember that even nearly two years into the game (like I am) you can still learn stuff!
Welcome aboard! I'm suprised you username hadn't been snatched before.
